title: FS: Lot of Three SL - SGC 30

posts.post_title: FS: Lot of Three SL - SGC 30
posts.post_content:
Asking $200 delivered for the three southern leaguers.  Price includes delivery; paypal preferred.

Ernie Howard (P350): SGC30 ([URL="http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100067/221/web.jpg"]Front[/URL] | [URL="http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100067/221b/web.jpg"]Back[/URL])
